text: Alessandra Pagliaro (born 16 July 1997) is an Italian female weightlifter bronze medal at the 2018 European Weightlifting Championships. ==Biography== Alessandra is the sister of the other Italian weightlifting champion Genny Pagliaro. In addition ath the European medal, at international senior level she won also a bronze medal, in the snatch too, at the 2018 Mediterranean Games. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female weightlifters Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Italy Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in weightlifting Category:Athletes of Fiamme Rosse Category:European Weightlifting Championships medalists
title: Alessandra Pagliaro
